price: Ele criou os céus e a terra, com a verdade. Sublimado seja Ele acima do que idolatram!
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
